title: Red Zone Player of the Week: Alex Day of NLR
text:
Red Zone Player of the Week: Alex Day of NLR Each week, THV11 showcases one football player who is going above and beyond on the field. Post to Facebook Red Zone Player of the Week: Alex Day of NLR Each week, THV11 showcases one football player who is going above and beyond on the field.  //on.kthv.com/1RJfTEx   Join the Conversation To   Red Zone Player of the Week: Alex Day of NLR THV11's Red Zone Player of the week is North Little Rock Running Back Alex Day. THV11.com 10/14/15 KTHV THV 11 Staff, news source 10:56 p.m. CDT October 14, 2015 Alex Day CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
NORTH LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTHV) -- Each week, THV11 showcases one football player who is going above and beyond on the field. This week's Red Zone Player is North Little Rock running back, Alex Day 
It's easy to say that luck hasn't been on North Little Rock's side this season with many injuries. 
The Charging Wildcats have been playing without seven key starters. 
In the nail biter game against Jonesboro, they pulled off a 70-64 win. 
There's one player that continues to give North Little Rock that extra push. The 5'8, 190 pound junior continues to bulldoze through opposing teams. 
Watch the video for more! Read or Share this story: http://on.kthv.com/1RJfTEx TOP VIDEOS
